name: hyper-cutter

effect.scarlet_violet: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.the_teal_mask: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.legends_za: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon's prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
